metadata.synopsis: Gale is interested in items woven with especially powerful magic. In these lines, you come across one such item. This one is a drow cowl called the Shadow of Menzoberranzan.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Feels like there's magic in every thread of this cowl. Something for Gale, certainly.

0.speaker: Gale
0.text: Very fine drow weave indeed, if you'll excuse the pun. I can most certainly use it.
